head.title: French Cosmetics Company To Open Store at Mall

hedline.hl1: French Cosmetics Company To Open Store at Mall

abstract.p: French cosmetics firm Sephora is slated to open store at The Westchester mall in White Plains, NY, on October 6 (S)

block.p: Sephora, the French cosmetics company, is scheduled to open a store at The Westchester Oct. 6, and cosmetics enthusiasts will no longer have to travel to Manhattan for the company's products.
The 4,354-square-foot White Plains store joins 61 other United States outlets of the world's largest beauty company, a division of the LVHM Corporation.
Sephora, the French cosmetics company, is scheduled to open a store at The Westchester Oct. 6, and cosmetics enthusiasts will no longer have to travel to Manhattan for the company's products.
The 4,354-square-foot White Plains store joins 61 other United States outlets of the world's largest beauty company, a division of the LVHM Corporation.

Distinguished by black-clad sales staff and an open-shelving system that permits consumers to sample products, Sephora features not only name-brand perfumes and makeup lines but also private-label lipsticks, nail polish, eye shadows, blushes, foundations, body paint, soaps and shower gels, among other items.
